game.name: Orson, P.I.: Midnight at the Grand Hotel
game.categories: Single-player, Captions available, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Twelve guests at a Chicago hotel plot to steal millions in jewels. Stop them before midnight strikes.
